casebody.data:
STATE of NC
v.
KING. No. 581P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the request filed on the 21st day of January 2005 by Defendant for Ruling:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
